Package common.Reports

Class InventoryReport

java.lang.Object
common.Reports.InventoryReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class InventoryReport extends Object implements Serializable
The InventoryReport class contains details about an inventory report. This includes information such as the report ID, area, machine ID, products, month, year, and total value.
Author:
Ben

  • Constructor Details

    • InventoryReport

      public InventoryReport()
      The default constructor for the InventoryReport class.

    • InventoryReport

      public InventoryReport(String reportID, String area, String machineID, ArrayList<Product> products, String month, String year, float totalValue)
      A constructor for the InventoryReport class that takes in all the fields as arguments.
      Parameters:
      reportID - the unique ID of the inventory report
      area - the area the report belongs to
      machineID - the machine ID the report belongs to
      products - the products the report contains
      month - the month the report was generated
      year - the year the report was generated
      totalValue - the total value of the products in the report
